description.value:
Activation: 8

You hone your intuition and understanding of others, enabling you to spot easy-to-miss signs of hidden symptoms and complicated feelings.

When you acquire this talent, your Erudition talent grants you an additional skill, and you can use Erudition to choose spiritual skills that aren’t surges.

Additionally, you gain a utility expertise in Diagnosis.
description.chat:
Activation: 8

Gain Diagnosis expertise. Gain an additional skill from @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.8FYBJZC8PBjneOim]{Erudition}. You can now choose spiritual skills with Erudition.
description.short:
Activation: 8

When you acquire this talent, your @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.8FYBJZC8PBjneOim]{Erudition} talent grants you an additional skill, and you can use Erudition to choose spiritual skills that aren’t surges.

Additionally, you gain a utility expertise in Diagnosis.
